description: Detects the image load of vss_ps.dll by uncommon executables
author: Markus Neis
@markus_neis
name: Suspicious Volume Shadow Copy VSS_PS.dll Load
query: (dll.path:*\\vss_ps.dll AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\*" AND process.executable.text:("*\\clussvc.exe" OR "*\\dismhost.exe" OR "*\\dllhost.exe" OR "*\\inetsrv\\appcmd.exe" OR "*\\inetsrv\\iissetup.exe" OR "*\\msiexec.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\searchindexer.exe" OR "*\\srtasks.exe" OR "*\\svchost.exe" OR "*\\taskhostw.exe" OR "*\\thor.exe" OR "*\\thor64.exe" OR "*\\tiworker.exe" OR "*\\vssvc.exe" OR "*\\WmiPrvSE.exe" OR "*\\System32\\SystemPropertiesAdvanced.exe"))) OR (process.executable.text:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\*" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"C\:\\$WinREAgent\\Scratch\\*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\dismhost.exe\ \{*")) OR (NOT _exists_:process.executable.text))))
